segments.text: What would you like to be in the future ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But if I were you , I would be a singer . You've got such a beautiful voice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wouldn't like to be a singer , but I'd like to become a music teacher to teach children to sing , That dream developed in my mind when I was a child .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm quite sure . I've always loved working with children .
segments.speaker: S2
